Installation
============

The :wiki:`QuickStart` guide describes the standard, recommended and quick way
to install the Nagare framework.

The :wiki:`NagareInstallation` guide details the various ways and options to
install the framework under Linux and Windows. Especially, read this guide if you
want a developer installation of the framework.

The :wiki:`NagareUpgrade` guide describes how to upgrade an existing Nagare
installation.

Then, if you want to install the demonstration follow the :wiki:`DemoInstallation`
documentation.

.. wikiname: NagareDownload
